line_2: Keep from commixtures foul and fond,

line_1: And nature seals her firmest bond;

line_2: By the new House alone to stand,

line_1: His being end where death dissolves the bond,
line_2: The tomb take all, and all be blank beyond,

line_1: Who seal'd for us a heavenly bond.
line_2: Which bids our hearts no more despond;
